name: Meltryllis (メルトリリス) - Lora
description:
話し合うつもりはなく
（既に、その必要を感じないほど愛している）
触れあいたい欲望もなく
（既に、その程度の快楽では物足りない）
愛してほしいと告げる気もない。
（既に、そんな相互理解は必要ない）

  • No trigger words required

  • There is another great lora for Meltryllis, https://civitai.com/models/12638/fate-grand-orderfate-extra-ccc-meltryllis. I just found it has too much AOM style baked in so I made my own.

  • Recommended prompts: long hair, purple hair, blue eyes, bangs, small breasts, hair ribbon, off shoulder, swimsuit, choker, collarbone, jacket, one-piece swinsuit, penguin hood, blue bow, prosthetic legs, crotch plate

  • CFG scale: 5.5 - 7

  • Weight: 0.6 - 1.0

modelVersions.name: v2meta
modelVersions.description:
1. Added trigger for the normal costume

  2. Better fitted penguin suit

  3. Better leg generation
